Uses of Class
org.opends.sdk.ldif.LDIFOutputStreamWriter

Packages that use LDIFOutputStreamWriter
org.opends.sdk.ldif   
 

Uses of LDIFOutputStreamWriter in org.opends.sdk.ldif
 

Methods in org.opends.sdk.ldif that return LDIFOutputStreamWriter
static LDIFOutputStreamWriter LDIFOutputStreamWriter.newChangeWriter(OutputStream out)
          Creates a new LDIF change record writer whose destination is the provided output stream and which will be used for writing change records.
static LDIFOutputStreamWriter LDIFOutputStreamWriter.newEntryWriter(OutputStream out)
          Creates a new LDIF change record writer whose destination is the provided output stream and which will be used for writing attribute-value records.
 LDIFOutputStreamWriter LDIFOutputStreamWriter.setAddUserFriendlyComments(boolean addUserFriendlyComments)
          Specifies whether or not user-friendly comments should be added whenever distinguished names or UTF-8 attribute values are encountered which contained non-ASCII characters.
 LDIFOutputStreamWriter LDIFOutputStreamWriter.setWrapColumn(int wrapColumn)
          Specifies the column at which long lines should be wrapped.
